definition: consecutive serial numbers/chain (of supermarkets, hotels etc)/hyphen
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people
lit. the river that divides Chu and Han/fig. a line that divides rival territories/the mid-line between sides on a Chinese chessboard
delaying tactics/stalling/measures to stave off an attack/stratagem to win a respite
clever and eloquent (idiom); fluent/having the gift of the gab
lit. wind past your ear/fig. sth you don't pay much attention to/in one ear and out the other
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: (jocularly) public building that has been lying idle (and is thus ideal for housing mosquitos) (Tw)
